integration.description: Integration details related to the transfer.

domain.description: The domain associated with the transfer.

amount.description: The amount of the transfer in the specified currency.

currency.description: The currency in which the transfer amount is specified.

reason.description: The reason or purpose of the transfer.

recipient.description: Details of the recipient who received the transfer

domain.description: The domain associated with the recipient.

currency.description: The currency associated with the recipient.

account_number.description: The account number of the recipient's bank account.

account_name.description: The name associated with the recipient's bank account.

bank_code.description: The code identifying the recipient's bank.

bank_name.description: The name of the recipient's bank.

metadata.description: Additional metadata related to the recipient.

recipient_code.description: The unique code assigned to the recipient.

active.description: Represents whether the recipient is active or inactive.

id.description: The unique identifier for the recipient.

integration.description: Integration details related to the recipient.

createdAt.description: The date and time when the recipient was created.

updatedAt.description: The date and time when the recipient was last updated.

id.description: The unique identifier for the transfer.

createdAt.description: The date and time when the transfer was created.

updatedAt.description: The date and time when the transfer was last updated.
